Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Fantasiestücke, op. 12

1837

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 25' 30"

  • 1. Des Abends
  • 2. Aufschwung
  • 3. Warum?
  • 4. Grillen
  • 5. In der Nacht
  • 6. Fabel
  • 7. Traumes Wirren
  • 8. Ende vom Lied
  • Feurigst

The eight pieces are split into two books of four each. Schumann completed two further pieces for this collection that he ultimately rejected: one marked Feurigst, and Leid ohne Ende (no. 8) from the Albumblätter (op. 124).

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/2 · RSA 1017 · ed. Michael Beiche [including no. 9]
  • Associated Board · ed. Howard Ferguson [including no. 9]
  • Henle · HN 922 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including no. 9]
  • Henle · HN 923 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including no. 9]
  • Henle · HN 91 · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including no. 9]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50038 · ed. Hans-Christian Müller

1. Des Abends

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Aufschwung

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Warum?

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. Grillen

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

5. In der Nacht

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4

6. Fabel

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

7. Traumes Wirren

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4

8. Ende vom Lied

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

Feurigst

An additional piece exists that was not included in the final collection.

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3
